verses.roman:
eka-dina pradyumna-miśra prabhura caraṇe
daṇḍavat kari' kichu kare nivedane

synonyms: eka-dina—one day; pradyumna-miśra—the devotee named Pradyumna Miśra; prabhura caraṇe—at the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; daṇḍavat kari'-offering his respects; kichu—something; kare nivedane—submits as a petition.
translation: One day Pradyumna Miśra came to see Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, offering his respects and inquiring from Him with great submission.
